short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A todo list extension that gives time-based notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Task Zone - Simple and Functional Task Management

Task Zone is a useful and flexible extension that allows you to easily manage your tasks. Here are the main features that set this extension apart from others:

Date and Time Tracking: Not only can you create tasks, but you can also assign a specific date and time to ensure timely completion. This feature makes it easy to plan and organize your tasks.

Customizable Background Color: Personalize your task list to your liking. You can adjust the background color of the extension to create a more pleasant appearance.

PDF Reporting: Easily download daily reports of your tasks in PDF format. By clicking on the pin icon, you can generate and regularly follow the report titled "Daily Reporting."

Flexible Usage: The extension allows you to use your tasks not only with date and time but also as a simple to-do list. You can check off tasks as they are completed.

Progress Bar: Track your progress visually with a progress bar that fills up as your tasks are completed. This feature helps increase your motivation as you complete your tasks.

The Task Zone extension is perfect for both personal and professional use. It helps you stay organized, plan efficiently, and remain motivated.
